page.title: 15EVENTS AT THE FETE
page.content: the fifty pence piece. At the fete there was are local ice-cream man called Berni who drove an ice-cream van.He sold ice-creams,lollies and sweets. There was a fancy dress and Jodie Webb came first,he dressed up as a Jack in the Box.Daniel James who is only three came second and he dressed up as a shepherd boy and Peter Wilton-Jones came third and he dressed up as Dick Turpin. There was a train on a little track for small children and there was a cart on this high platform. All-together it was a very nice day.I really enjoyed it.
